function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of research stream on emerging technologies impact on disaster management or collaborative models of governance in smart cities.","Impact":"Limited understanding and preparedness for potential technological solutions in disaster management and collaborative governance models in smart cities.","Mitigation":"Encouraging more research on the impact of emerging technologies on disaster management and collaborative governance models in smart cities.","Technologies":"Data analytics, IoT, AI, and blockchain can be used to improve disaster management and collaborative governance in smart cities.","People":"Researchers, city planners, disaster management professionals.","Owner":"Research institutions, government bodies, and technology developers."},{"Description":"Reliance on Open Government technology for disaster management.","Impact":"Overreliance on a single technology for disaster management may limit the diversity and effectiveness of solutions.","Mitigation":"Diversifying the technological tools used for disaster management and governance models.","Technologies":"Encouraging the use of a variety of emerging technologies such as IoT, AI, and blockchain for disaster management.","People":"Disaster management professionals, city planners, technology developers.","Owner":"Government bodies, technology developers, and disaster management organizations."}]}
